The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 03 December is 1,438,725 (2,556.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 28 November, there were 87,456 new confirmed cases (155.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 November, there were 117,251 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 25% (29,795 fewer cases).
